ID: 1276

Event Name: ETHDenver

Event Location: Denver, Colorado

Event Dates: 2024-02-23

Event End Dates: 2024-03-03

About Event: ETH Denver 2024 will be taking place from February 19-March 3 at the #BUIDLHub and the $Spork Castle in Downtown Denver.

With the genesis of SporkDAO in June of 2021, ETHDenver became the first event DAO in the world. All event proceeds are used to #BUIDL value for our community and to realize the decentralized future.
‍
2024 is The Year of the SporkWhale. SporkWhales are peak contributors to the SporkDAO ecosystem. They #BUIDL, submit projects, create, and frolic in the Bufficorn Sea. Known for their large troves of $SPORK, SporkWhales are indeed a curious and fantastical member of the Bufficorn family.

SporkDAO’s ETHDenver #BUIDLathon is about gathering like-minds around a common purpose. Distributed computing is the future, and Colorado is a leading community supporting this emerging technology.

‍Our goal is empowering the Web3 community to shape this new world while cementing the Rocky Mountain region and the state of Colorado as a thriving hub of Ethereum and blockchain innovation.

Event Type: Conference

Event Category: Business

Event URL: https://crewfare.com/events/eth-denver/

ID: 2486

Event Name: STFU & Party Bimini

Event Location: Bimini, The Bahamas

Event Dates: 2024-03-03

Event End Dates: 2024-03-17

About Event: STFU & Party is a travel agency specializing in once-in-a-lifetime experiences. We started this company with the goal of planning some of the most unforgettable trips at the most exciting destinations.

We know group trips are hard to plan and we understand that sometimes things can get confusing... Don't worry we are here to help! When you book our trips or customize your own experience with us, you and your group will have a streamlined trip so you can relax and enjoy.

We customize itineraries to suit your group's needs, leverage our relationships in the travel and entertainment industry to offer you the best rates and VIP access possible, and execute your dream trips from start to finish - providing a central place for your group to pay with payment plan options and split payments, choose roommates, and input traveler information.

Event Type: group trip

Event Category: Adventure

Event URL: http://stfuandbimini.crewfare.com

ID: 3816

Event Name: Hyde Park Winter Wonderland

Event Location: London, England

Event Dates: 2023-11-17

Event End Dates: 2024-01-01

About Event: Located in London’s iconic Hyde Park, Winter Wonderland is the world’s ultimate destination for festive fun. Running for six magical weeks from 17th November 2023 to 1st January 2024, Hyde Park Winter Wonderland offers a variety of attractions, activities, entertainment, food, drinks, and so much more.

From high adrenaline rides to family-friendly performances, classic festive treats to the newest in London’s street food scene, and cosy fire pit bars to mythical ice kingdoms – we guarantee there’s something for everyone. Make the most of your festive season in true Winter Wonderland style!

Event Type: festival

Event Category: Arts

Event URL: https://crewfare.com/uk/events/hydeparkwinterwonderland/

ID: 3821

Event Name: TYR Wodapalooza

Event Location: Miami, Florida

Event Dates: 2024-01-11

Event End Dates: 2024-01-14

About Event: The TYR Wodapalooza (WZA) began as a grassroots single-day fitness competition with 145 athletes and 500 spectators in 2012 and has since established itself as the world’s premier Functional Fitness Festival. Wodapalooza descends on Miami’s Bayfront Park for 4-days in January and brings together thousands of athletes, spectators, and fitness fanatics to celebrate fitness, community, and life.

There are multiple parts to WZA Miami – the fitness competition for all backgrounds and levels (the foundation of WZA), the Gauntlet (an exciting and fast race through three workouts within an hour), and the spectator experience, which includes one of the largest collections of vendors and exhibitors as well as spectator workouts and seminars.

All set next to the Biscayne Bay in sunny Miami, the TYR Wodapalooza has become a calendar staple for the fitness community and a winter getaway for athletes from around the world.

Event Type: Fitness Festival

Event Category: Adventure

Event URL: https://crewfare.com/events/wodapalooza-2024/

Event Dates: 2024-02-15

Event End Dates: 2024-02-17

About Event: The Premiere Conference for the Festival Industry in North America since 2015: We have tackled issues ranging from ticketing, sponsorship, talent buying, programming, sustainability, safety, marketing and more with panels, contests, keynotes and case studies. FestForums has been held in Santa Barbara, NYC and San Francisco. Live music, film premieres, cooking demos and wine tastings are also our trademark entertainment!

BCMF is host to the industry’s biggest stars with 40+ artists slated for June 20-23, 2024, bringing a unique blend of today’s country headliners, regional stars, up-and-comers, and locals favorites performing across 5 stages. With the combination of country music and the scenic Wildwood’s backdrop, this family-friendly, four-day fest is THE summer vacation destination.

Event Name: Vibra Urbana

Event Location: Miami, Florida

Event Dates: 2024-02-17

Event End Dates: 2024-02-18

About Event: Vibra Urbana is a 2-day festival taking place on February 17-18 , 2024 at the Miami-Dade County Fair & Expo, located at 10901 SW 24th ST Miami, FL 33165. The venue opens at 1 PM both days with shows taking place rain or shine. No re-entry into the event is permitted. All ages are welcome in General Admission areas, but the VIP/Leyenda tickets are for people 21+. Food and beverages are sold separately throughout the festival grounds with many different options, so there's something for everybody. All lineup, set times, festival hours, and venue are subject to change without notice, and curfew will be at 11 PM on both festival nights.

Event Category: Culture

Event URL: https://crewfare.com/events/vibra-urbana-miami/

About Event: Dubbed as the biggest Hip Hop festival in the world, Rolling Loud produced their first festival in 2015. This years California event will be taking place at the Hollywood Park Grounds, adjacent from SoFi Stadium. ID: 6055 Event Name: South Beach Wine and Food Festival Event Location: Miami, Florida Event Dates: 2024-02-22 Event End Dates: 2024-02-25 About Event: Food Network South Beach Wine & Food Festival presented by Capital One (SOBEWFF®) is a national, star-studded, four-day destination event showcasing the talents of the world’s most renowned wine and spirits producers, chefs and culinary personalities. The Festival takes place February 22 – 25, 2024. Every year, this five-day February event attracts many of the big names in the food and beverage industry, from celebrity sommeliers to chefs and culinary personalities. Since it has started, the fest has grown into a world of tastings, seminars, brunches, dinners, lunches, and parties. All net proceeds from the Festival benefit the Florida International University Chaplin School of Hospitality & Tourism Management. Event Type: Event Category: Arts Event URL: https://crewfare.com/events/sobe-wff/

ID: 6057

Event Name: Dreamville Festival

Event Location: Raleigh, North Carolina

Event Dates: 2024-04-06

Event End Dates: 2024-04-07

About Event: Held annually each spring in Raleigh, Dreamville Festival is an outdoor weekend music celebration curated by internationally-acclaimed hip-hop superstar J. Cole alongside his Dreamville team.

The festival serves as Dreamville’s signature annual event for its fans worldwide bringing together local residents and travelers alike to gather together and enjoy incredible music performances in one of America’s most beautiful and historic public parks, Dorothea Dix Park – Raleigh’s largest city park with over 300 acres of sprawling greenspace.

As one of the most anticipated annual events in the state of North Carolina, the festival acts as a perfect complement to the existing event landscape and cultural fabric of the city of Raleigh.

As a proud Black-owned music festival, Dreamville continues to emphasize community, diversity, and inclusivity throughout the onsite fan experience each spring.

If you’ve never been, imagine a large-scale multi-stage festival featuring performances from some of the biggest names in music merged with a family-style cookout where everyone feels welcome and has a seat at the table. ALL are welcome at Dreamville Festival!

In this same spirit, J. Cole regularly invites his favorite musical artists and collaborators from across the world to perform in his home state of North Carolina – some of whom are performing for their first time ever in Raleigh – while the festival plays host to dozens of local independently-owned businesses, as well as artisans, muralists, merchants, and community organizations to offer attendees a true taste of the good life in Raleigh.

Beyond the cultural impact that Dreamville Festival creates, the weekend celebration has also become well-known for meticulously curating each year a new music lineup unlike any other, blending together stadium headliners alongside exciting up-and-comers.

Notable past performers to have graced the festival’s main stages include the biggest names in hip-hop and R&B, with a mix of established touring acts, rare on-stage reunions, and exciting up-and-comers.

The festival marks an annual reunion for Dreamville Records as J. Cole taps the entire roster to perform at the fest including Ari Lennox, Bas, J.I.D, EarthGang, Cozz, and Omen, plus Lute who hails from nearby Charlotte. With performances that highlight their latest chart-topping projects, plus old-school throwbacks and unreleased music, this festival is truly a DREAM come true for any day-one Dreamville fans.

Having grown up nearby in Fayetteville, J. Cole and his Dreamville team use the festival as an annual opportunity to shine a light on the special place that helped shape him into the successful and creative artist he is today.

Since launching in 2018, Dreamville Festival has become one of the largest annual events in the state of North Carolina as well as one of today’s most popular artist-led music festivals in the world, with guests regularly traveling from across the globe and all 50 U.S. states to attend this one-of-a-kind music experience.

Dreamville Festival today generates millions of dollars each year for the local and North Carolina economy, while providing a positive and substantial cultural impact on Raleigh and the surrounding areas that lasts long after the festival wraps up each spring.

Event Type: 

Event Category: Culture

Event URL: https://crewfare.com/events/dreamvillefest/

ID: 6044

Event Name: Lake Tahoe Winter Reggae Festival

Event Location: Stateline, Nevada

Event Dates: 2024-02-17

Event End Dates: 2024-02-18

About Event: Good Vibez Presents and PR Entertainment, Inc., the teams behind Tahoe's ever-popular Lake Tahoe Reggae Festival, are bringing the warm reggae vibes in the middle of the snow season to the Lake Tahoe Winter Reggae Festival 2024 at the brand new Tahoe Blue Event Center in Stateline, Nevada. The combination of this year's lineup, reggae vibes, stunning winter landscapes, and the warmth and excitement of the local community over the holiday weekend creates a truly magical experience that we can all look forward to.  We can't think of a better pairing than hitting the slopes in the morning followed by grooving to reggae in the evenings.

Event URL: https://crewfare.com/events/laketahoe-winter-reggae/

ID: 6060

Event Name: Holo Holo Music Festival

Event Location: Las Vegas, Nevada

Event Dates: 2024-04-26

Event End Dates: 2024-04-28

About Event: "'Holo Holo' means to travel, to sail, to move," says O'ahu-born Good Vibez co-owner, Dan Sheehan. This familiar expression is most often heard between friends as in 'let's holo holo up country', Sheehan says, when detailing the festival's origin. The inaugural Holo Holo Music Festival took place in Northern California at Frost Amphitheater at Stanford University in 2022, but "this event desires movement, so carrying Holo Holo to Las Vegas and Sacramento in 2023 was a natural progression for its fluidity."

In 2024, Holo Holo Music Festival will be taking place at the Downtown Las Vegas Events Center from April 26-28.

Event Type: 

Event Category: Music

Event URL: https://crewfare.com/events/holoholo-music-festival-lv/

ID: 6600 Event Name: Afronation Portugal Event Location: Portimao, Portugal Event Dates: 2024-06-26 Event End Dates: 2024-06-28 About Event:

Catch us at the Algarve!

When it comes to festival venues, we’re winning every time! Praia Da Rocha, Portimão is for the lovers of breathtaking views, golden hour & the glistening sea. Portimão is a huge tourism hub. Restaurants, nightlife, stunning hotels and villas, historic sites and more, there’s really something for everyone. Praia Da Rocha is the town’s main beach. The red-rock cliffs that surround it show they were playing no games giving it the name “Rocky Beach” in Portuguese.
